## PageViewEvent interface

A Page View event Used for tracking a page view

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface PageViewEvent 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [contextCallback?](./browser-tracker.pageviewevent.contextcallback.md) | (() =&gt; Array&lt;SelfDescribingJson&gt;) \| null | <i>(Optional)</i> A callback which will fire on the page view and each subsequent activity tracking event for this page view |
|  [title?](./browser-tracker.pageviewevent.title.md) | string \| null | <i>(Optional)</i> Override the page title |
